revised_title: Anatomical Changes and Absinthe Epilepsy: A Study of Descending Degenerations in the Brain and Spinal Cord
tldr: This study investigates the anatomical changes and descending degenerations in the brain and spinal cord of cats following various lesions and absinthe administration. The research aims to determine the seat of origin and paths of conduction of fits in absinthe epilepsy and understand the role of different brain regions in the production of fits.
